Package com.genband.mobile.api.services.call

Interface CallInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
IncomingCallInterface, OutgoingCallInterface
public interface CallInterface
Base interface for all call classes.
Since:
2.0.0

  • Method Details

    • endCall

      void endCall() throws MobileException
      Stops the related call and releases allocated resources.
      Throws:
      MobileException
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • endCall

      void endCall(String callEndReason) throws MobileException
      Stops the related call with reason and releases allocated resources. If reason string char length is more than 600 char, first 600 char will send to remote.
      Parameters:
      callEndReason - String end call reason (Limit is 600 character)
      Throws:
      MobileException
      Since:
      4.4.1

    • videoUnMute

      void videoUnMute()
      Since:
      6.6.0

    • videoMute

      void videoMute()
      Since:
      6.6.0

    • videoStart

      void videoStart()
      Starts video of local user.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • videoStop

      void videoStop()
      Stops the video of local user.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • mute

      void mute()
      Mutes the voice of local user.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • unMute

      void unMute()
      Opens the voice of local user.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • holdCall

      void holdCall()
      Holds the related call.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • unHoldCall

      void unHoldCall()
      Unholds the related call.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • sendCustomParameters

      void sendCustomParameters(Map<String,String> customParameters)
      Sends the given custom SIP headers to SPiDR server.
      Parameters:
      customParameters - key-value pairs of custom SIP headers to send
      Since:
      4.5.0

    • setCustomParameters

      void setCustomParameters(Map<String,String> customParameters)
      Sets given custom SIP Headers as custom parameters to call in order to send them in all mid-call event requests.
      Parameters:
      customParameters - key-value pairs of custom SIP headers to send
      Since:
      4.5.0

    • getCustomParameters

      Map<String,String> getCustomParameters()
      Gets custom SIP Headers which are set to the Call as custom parameters to call in order to send them in all mid-call event requests.
      Returns:
      customParameters key-value pairs of custom SIP headers to send
      Since:
      4.5.0

    • setCaptureDevice

      void setCaptureDevice(int position, android.hardware.Camera.Size videoResolution, ProcessListener processListener)
      Sets device capture and video resolution to specified position and resolution of the related call
      Parameters:
      position - that intended to setting
      videoResolution - that intended to resolution
      processListener - that returns setting device capture result
      Since:
      3.0.0

    • setCaptureDevice

      void setCaptureDevice(android.content.Intent mediaProjectionPermissionResultData, ProcessListener processListener)
      Sets device capture to image source for the related call
      Parameters:
      mediaProjectionPermissionResultData -
      processListener - that returns setting device capture result
      Since:
      3.1.4

    • changeVideoResolution

      void changeVideoResolution(int width, int height)
      Changes video resolution as given values. These values are not saved so they can be thought as temporary
      Parameters:
      width - width of video
      height - height of video

    • transferCall

      void transferCall(String newAddress)
      Transfers the call to the given address. Note that, transfer operation cannot be used with Anonymous calls.
      Parameters:
      newAddress - String user which call will be transferred to
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • consultativeTransfer

      void consultativeTransfer(CallInterface call)
      Transfers the current call to the transfer target given with another call session in a consultative transfer manner. Note that, consultative transfer operation cannot be used with Anonymous calls.
      Parameters:
      call - other call session as transfer target
      Since:
      4.5.1

    • getCallerAddress

      String getCallerAddress()
      Returns the caller address information related the call instance
      Returns:

      Since:
      2.0.0

      Returns the callee address information related the call instance
      Returns:
      String
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getId

      String getId()
      Returns unique identifier of call object which is generated from SDK Identifier is NOT related with SIP session id
      Returns:
      String unique identifier of call object
      Since:
      4.0.2

    • getCallId

      String getCallId()
      Returns callId that related with SIP session id For the outgoing call, this value is not set until establish call is succeeded
      Returns:
      String identifier that related SIP session id
      Since:
      2.0.0

      Since:

      Returns if video enabled for this call.

      Boolean
      Since:

    • setVideoEnabled

      void setVideoEnabled(boolean videoEnabled)
      Sets video enabled or not for this call.
      Parameters:
      videoEnabled - Boolean
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • canReceiveVideo

      boolean canReceiveVideo()
      Indicates remote side can send video or not. Local side can receive video if he wishes. It is determined by Remote Session Description direction as follows
      SDP Directions
      sendrecv sendonly recvonly inactive
      Values true true false false
      Returns:
      boolean
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • canSendVideo

      boolean canSendVideo()
      Indicates remote side can receive video or not. Local side can send video if he wishes. It is determined by Remote Session Description direction as follows
      SDP Directions
      sendrecv sendonly recvonly inactive
      Values true false true false
      Returns:
      boolean
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getActiveCamera

      int getActiveCamera()
      Returns:
      int position of the current active camera
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getCameraResolution

      android.hardware.Camera.Size getCameraResolution()
      Returns:
      Camera.Size camera resolution of the current active camera
      Since:
      4.0.2
      See Also:
      • Camera.Size

    • setCallerName

      void setCallerName(String callerName)
      This method sets the caller name of origin. Especially needed for anonymous calls.
      Parameters:
      callerName - Name, which will be shown on the screen of terminator.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getCallerName

      String getCallerName()
      Returns caller name of the related call
      Returns:
      String
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getCalleeName

      String getCalleeName()
      Returns caller name of the related call
      Returns:
      String
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • sendDTMF

      boolean sendDTMF(char tone)
      Inserts Dual Tone Multi Frequency Signal to sending queue and returns the success
      Parameters:
      tone - character value of DTMF tone. Can only be 0,1...,9,*,#,a,b,c,d,A,B,C,D;
      Returns:
      true if tone can be successfully inserted to queue otherwise false
      Since:
      3.0.1

    • addPropertyChangeListener

      void addPropertyChangeListener(Constants.ChangeListenerKey propertyName, PropertyChangeListener listener)
      In case of callerAddress or calleeAddress changes this callback will notify the application.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - parameter for which object should listen
      listener - listener object

    • getRTPStatistics

      void getRTPStatistics(RTPStatisticsHandler handler)
      Gets RTP/RTP Statistics for related call
      Parameters:
      handler - Handler Interface to get RTP statistics
      Since:
      3.1.4

    • takeLocalVideoSnapshot

      void takeLocalVideoSnapshot(Snapshot.TakeSnapshotCallback callback)
      Takes still image of the active local video stream
      Parameters:
      callback - to capture result of the operation
      Since:
      4.5.2

    • getAvailableCodecs

      List<Map> getAvailableCodecs(CodecType codecType)
      Returns the list of available and supported codecs
      Parameters:
      codecType - the type of the codecs
      Returns:
      the codec list

    • setExternalAudioWithFile

      void setExternalAudioWithFile(android.net.Uri fileUri, int repeatFor, ProcessListener listener)
      Allows applications to set the audio file as external audio source and play it for the specified times. SDK can transmit audio file to remote peer if application uses this API.
      Parameters:
      fileUri - Uri of the audio file
      repeatFor - Number of times to play the audio file
      listener - Listener to get the result of the operation
      Since:
      6.14.0

    • setExternalAudioWithFile

      void setExternalAudioWithFile(android.net.Uri fileUri, ProcessListener listener)
      Allows applications to set the audio file as external audio source and play it once. SDK can transmit audio file to remote peer if application uses this API.
      Parameters:
      fileUri - Uri of the audio file
      listener - Listener to get the result of the operation
      Since:
      6.14.0

    • setAudioSourceType

      void setAudioSourceType(com.genband.mobile.impl.services.call.Call.AudioSourceType audioSourceType)
      Allows applications to set AudioSourceType.
      Parameters:
      audioSourceType - AudioSourceType AudioSourceType.MICROPHONE: Audio will be captured from microphone AudioSourceType.EXTERNAL_AUDIO: Audio will be captured from external audio source
      Since:
      6.14.0
